ygData.subject: Wolf's Eye Agate
ygData.msgSnippet: Fellow Enchanter s and Jewellers: I have been asked by a few of my allies for some fine jewellery that would giev them some resistence to magic.  As of now, my
ygData.messageBody:
Fellow Enchanter's and Jewellers:

I have been asked by a few of my allies for some
fine jewellery that would giev them some
resistence to magic. As of now, my skill is not
that high, and I can only make enchanted topaz
necklaces. After examining some charts on
jewellery, i have found that Wolf's Eye Agate will
indeed make an item that will help you versus
magic, when combined with silver. Would anyone
happen to know where a tradesman such as I could
purchase, or find, some of this stone. I have
not been successful in locating it in Erudin or
in Qeynos as of yet.

Any help in this matter would be appreciated.

Sinth the Enchanter
lvl 9
